title: Royalboss
author: Royalboss
content: Im looking for partner who Will create stablecoinYou as partner Will take care of the techical part of it i will taking care of the rest.I Will make world to adopt this and i will promote i will make also the IMF to start use this coin my coin.Also i Will make it connect ATM-S directly so the banks we use are just nonsense why we. Need banks If we only need my Stablecoins and cash system to connect with crypto exachangers and wallets clearly the current banking system not needed anymore.Kings and queens nobody didnt ask from them to start rule they was just Active in times of changes so while others was just waiting the most active people in society started doing something like federal reserve was created nobody didnt told them to start just group of active people started together something and so we will do aswell we will change the current system and start our own becouse old system dont work anymore the new system can give us wealth as much we need the old system not working so join and help us to expand and you Will reap the most Benefits.World is changing and now it's time to Act If you want to secure your future and your family future.We Will aitdrop huge ammounts of coins to our partners and those who will help us to promote and will get our Stablecoin adoption going on around the world.Also any suggestions about will we create our own blockchain network or we use some blockchain like trx or eth or maybe avax SOLANA?? Any suggestions? Join with me together we are Strong let's leave the current non beneficial system and use new one.

comments.author: Fullbear2222
comments.created_time: May 31, 2023, 09:18:44 AMLast edit: May 31, 2023, 09:29:47 AM by Fullbear2222
comments.body: Friend of mine running shops in europe....i can connect you to with Him.But how many Stablecoins you airdrop for me and for my friend If he willl make his customers to pay only with your Stablecoins? I want Nice % since you can create money i will take some 500,000$ of stable coins to help you on this deal first and later i want off course more money ...Im business person and Im serious about money If you serious then we can make serious business together i can help your coin adoption If i make Nice % out of it. I know Same serious business people as Im so i can help you to make your Stablecoin big ...you can create eur or gbp i have connections in UK Also off licence shop owners they can make their customers to use our stable coin .... You can create Even UK currency Also i have serious business people in UK Also but they want nice ammount if they help wich is not problem for you to pay since you will be the money supply operator.Show me the money big Money and Im in this project. You make money and i make money But first since i need money first make some nice ammount airdrop for me show me the money and i will be loyal to you forever i Will do my best to get your project success Can you give me just for motivation little ammount of your Stablecoins...about 500,000 USD willl get me going ...i dont ask big money first i'll show you results first then we can make some bigger deal business ammounts of money Thank you brother let's make business Im serious busines person If i see the Money i will be serious about business

comments.author: bettercrypto
comments.body: Quote from: Royalboss on May 31, 2023, 08:44:55 AMAlso any suggestions about will we create our own blockchain network or we use some blockchain like trx or eth or maybe avax SOLANA?? Any suggestions? Why did you think of making Stablecoins a development project? apart from this, do you have a deep idea of what you are entering into the Crypto space or bockchain technology? Are you a developer or looking for a developer?      Or maybe the reason is that many banking systems today are outdated and inefficient due to the inflation that is happening now?am I right? Also, making a stablecoin is not that simple to do in my understanding. Then if you make a Stablecoin you need to make a prototype for it, and to have it you must have a Whitepaper to make for the stablecoins you will make, Now, if you are really determined, the good blockchain to use is TRON or TRC20 because its network is well established, because the security and infrastructure of this blockchain can support its high volume transaction.Guidelines of how to create Stablecoins?

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: To create a stablecoin, there must be a reserve to link its value, and the method of linking differs. Either it is centralized, which is what happens in USDT&USDC, or decentralized like Dai, where the smart contract generates currencies against USD. Those new pair coins are the ones that balance the value of the stable currency.Creating a centralized stablecoin is relatively easier, but you need a lot of money, as every dollar of stablecoin must equal a dollar in your bank account, and with regulatory legislation, I do not think that individuals can create a centralized stablecoin.For decentralized stablecoin, you need to hire a developer, not a partner.
